title: the new league client
body: It's more laggy than the old client, i mean yeah, it looks good, but all the animations really makes my mac laggy and i can't call the lanes that i want to play, i don't know about you, but please drop by and share your thoughts.

replies.body:
Try disabling animation in the client and see if it helps. To disable animations:

Click the Settings icon on the top-right of your client.
Select _General_ on the left side of the menu.
Check _Disable Animation_.

http://i.imgur.com/EU8Mvmg.png?noredirect

For now, you can still switch back to the Legacy client using the button on the login screen.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg
